name: THE BISMUTH PACT
description:
THE TREACHEROUS COVENANT OF SPONSORS HAS BROKEN CEASEFIRE

DEFEND THE CITY

ENFORCE THE TERMS OF

THE BISMUTH PACT

Entry for the 4th Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam, hosted in July 2020

Theme: Out of Control

Contend with the ever-changing DEFENSIVE GRID and volatile HAZARDS
against the endless armies of THE COVENANT OF SPONSORS.

The GRID is controlled by a simple Cellular Automaton:
Each turn, the GRID reorganizes itself and changes the STATE of every cell
depending on how many similar neighbors it has.
SPONSORED TROOPS approach from below,
determined to destroy THE CITY once and for all.
